description.value:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

You launch yourself across the battlefield. Stride and use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Black Powder Boost]. Make a melee Strike with an attached weapon or the required weapon's combination melee form, at any point during the Black Powder Boost.

Special If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Bullet Dancer Burn], apply the additional fire damage to the granted Strike.
